name: Numpuzz
description:
Numpuzz is a Classic Number Slide and Sort Puzzle Game. 

You will be provided with randomly sorted numbers and a empty block based on the level you select. The challenge is to slide and sort the numbers in increasing order with help of the empty block within minimum time and moves. Starting from 1 and the last one will be empty.

Numpuzz Has 4 Levels:
1. Easy 3x3 Board - for your Kids
2.  Medium 4x4 Board - the original classic game style for everyone
3.  Hard 5x5 Board - a little complex and requires skill to finish in time challenge
4.  Insane 8x8 Board - for veterans having skill and patience

In Game Features:
- Can be played offline without internet.
- Global Leaderboard - show off your scores to the players world wide
- Attractive stone carved design
- Option to Show off your scores on Social Network
